query:
ALTER TABLE rawMaterials 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS receivingStatus ENUM('none', 'ordered', 'in_transit', 'received', 'inspected') DEFAULT 'none',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPoId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quantityOnOrder DECIMAL(15,4) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quantityInTransit DECIMAL(15,4) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quantityReceived DECIMAL(15,4) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS expectedDeliveryDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastReceivedDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastReceivedQty DECIMAL(15,4)
